record.field: No valid mandate for payment "%(payment)s" of party "%(party)s" with amount "%(amount)s".
Invoice "%(invoice)s" has no bank account associated but payment type "%(payment_type)s" requires it.
Selected moves are balanced. Use concile wizard instead of creating a compensation move.
Parties can not be mixed to create a compensation move. Party "%(party)s" in line "%(line)s" is different from previous party "%(party)s"
It is not possible to modify the owner of bank account "%(account)s" as it is used on the %(field)s of %(model)s "%(name)s"
